properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 3:20AM AKST until February 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as
35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing
the visibility to one half mile or less at times. Total snow
accumulation of around two inches is expected.

* WHERE...Summits along the Steese and Dalton Highways.

* WHEN...6 PM today to midnight Sunday night.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT
